mapper.update:
update t_pay_log
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_man = #{contactMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_mode = #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
refund_reason = #{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select:
select from t_pay_log
user_id=#{userId}
and product_name like concat ('%',#{productName},'%')
and pay_date like concat ('%',#{payDate},'%')
and phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and address like concat ('%',#{address},'%')
and contact_man like concat ('%',#{contactMan},'%')
and pay_mode like concat ('%',#{payMode},'%')
and state like concat ('%',#{state},'%')
